rows.label: tev020201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel what precipitated the emergency landing.

rows.label: tev020201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel about the Ganglion threat.

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel about the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel about the Ganglion threat.

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel about the Ganglion threat.

rows.label: tev020201_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Sara-Ariel about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0001
rows.name:
The xenoforms that laid waste to Earth followed the
White Whale and attacked us without any attempt to
issue demands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Commander Nagi ordered us into our Skells to fight
back, but the bastards kept coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0003
rows.name: I lost a lot of friends that day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0004
rows.name:
To a man, the survivors said they felt lucky to have
made it out alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0005
rows.name:
But I don't feel lucky at all. And I won't until the day
my fist meets the face of whatever monster ordered that
attack![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0006
rows.name:
I don't know where he is, but when I find him,
I'm gonna beat him until he can't stand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yeah, something's troubling me all right. This BLADE
friend of mine who's like a little brother to me?
He went and found himself a girlfriend in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now every time we go drinking, I get a bunch of
questions about love and relationships and crap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I could teach him loads about how to throw a punch,
shoot a gun, or pilot a Skell...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I don't know a damn thing about love!
Never been in love, and never want to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0013
rows.name:
I do know this, though: If he fails to jump-to during an
attack because he's mooning over what's-her-name,
I'm gonna answer all his love questions with my fists![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0021
rows.name:
So they're called the Ganglion, huh?
We finally know the name of our enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0022
rows.name:
And that means we're on the trail of the bastards who
trashed Earth and killed my friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0023
rows.name:
I don't know what this Samaar Federation is all about,
but I don't care who the Ganglion have backing them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Nothing is going to stop me from putting this fist
through their faces. They will learn to fear the name
of BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0039
rows.name:
Did you see that Ryyz broad during the attack?
She was the one riding that giant black monster
and cackling like a maniac.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0040
rows.name:
As if using a monster to stomp screaming, cowering
civilians was just the most hilarious thing in the world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0041
rows.name: I won't forget that twisted smile of hers...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0042
rows.name:
At least, not until my fist rearranges it forever!
Better hope your dental plan is up to date, lady![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0057
rows.name: Is it true you took down that wretched Ryyz broad?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0058
rows.name:
The way she grinned as she murdered my friends...
I had wanted to avenge them with my own two fists![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0059
rows.name:
Nevertheless, I'm grateful for what you did.
Now everyone she killed can rest a little easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG0060
rows.name:
So let's keep this momentum going and destroy the rest
of the Ganglion. We'll teach those bastards what
humanity is really capable of![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1088
rows.name:
Thanks to your incredible work, the Ganglion boss
has been given the beatdown he so richly deserved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1089
rows.name:
But there's still plenty of his wormy little henchmen
scurrying around Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1090
rows.name:
Now it's our turn! We'll smash every last one of those
wretches who threaten New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1091
rows.name:
These fists of mine will blaze the way to humanity's
bright future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1094
rows.name:
I cannot BELIEVE that after you introduced us,
I ended up being dumped because of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1095
rows.name:
Er, not that I even care, mind you.
I didn't need a lover before, and I sure don't now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1096
rows.name:
All I need out of life is the smell of gunpowder
and a little action to get my blood pumping.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020201_MSG1097
rows.name:
And with so many enemies left to punch in the face,
I don't have time for a relationship anyway.[ST:wait ]
